channel.title: Pink HL2
channel.description:
Well, I'd been fiddling with the idea of creating a thread for all my pink recolors for quite a while now, and after some doubting, I decided to do it. Spamming F5 is a good job, mate! People around Steam are pretty aware of my pink obsession, so this will be no surprise for them, but, if I take away your faith in human kind and make you want to pull your eyes out with a fork, I apologize in advance :wink:
Now, on to the pics!
[b]HEV Suit, World Model[/b]
I didn't intend on working on this one at first, since you just see the model for a few seconds before wearing it, but since I'm a maniac, I did it anyway. That might explain the low quality of the recolor.
Here is the model without the lights on. The lambda symbol had to be white, yes. [img]https://dl.getdropbox.com/u/1869302/Pink%20HL2/hev%20model/hevworldmodel1.jpg[/img]
[img]https://dl.getdropbox.com/u/1869302/Pink%20HL2/hev%20model/hevworldmodel2.jpg[/img]
And here it is with the lights on. The lambda symbol can't be seen, and for that I am disappoint. [img]https://dl.getdropbox.com/u/1869302/Pink%20HL2/hev%20model/hevworldmodel3.jpg[/img]
[img]https://dl.getdropbox.com/u/1869302/Pink%20HL2/hev%20model/hevworldmodel4.jpg[/img]
[b]HEV Suit, Player View (Arms)[/b]
This is the one that started it all. I'd looked for a pink recolor all over the place, something simple like this, but since I couldn't find any, I decided to do it myself. Took me forever, but I am very happy with it.
Here are some pictures of the moment you get the suit. [img]https://dl.getdropbox.com/u/1869302/Pink%20HL2/arms/arms1.jpg[/img]
[img]https://dl.getdropbox.com/u/1869302/Pink%20HL2/arms/arms2.jpg[/img]
Reloading the crossbow. [img]https://dl.getdropbox.com/u/1869302/Pink%20HL2/arms/arms3.jpg[/img]
And here is a picture with the crowbar, so you can see the differences in color according to the environment. So very pink! [img]https://dl.getdropbox.com/u/1869302/Pink%20HL2/arms/arms4.jpg[/img]

item.title: Pink HL2
item.dc:creator: Disturbulator
item.description:
At first I was thinking: “Eugh pink shit?”

Then I saw Breen’s shirt.
He looks like he’s ready to give a bitchslap.

+1 Approve.

item.title: Pink HL2
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
Would it be fine for me to do a massive bump of this? Maybe, maybe not… Dunno, but still. I’m excited to say I’ll try to start working on my little project again, although I lost several recolors after some computer trouble (including the gravity gun, the buggy and the city scanner, my favorites…). But I’ll start redoing them, and who knows, maybe they’ll look even better

Did I ever get around to show what I was working on next? I think not. Well, here you go! I found these screenshots on the WIP folder I had laying around. I got a new computer since then, so my next screenshots should not suck so much (and this explains the awful low-ress-ness). First one is a remake of an old one I made, and the second one is, well, yet another personal favorite.

If you’ve got ideas for recolors or improvements over the old ones, I’ll be happy to take note!

Read full topic

item.title: Pink HL2
item.dc:creator: Trigger_Proximity
item.description:
Jokerine:

Seems like that will be the way to go, yup. Funny thing is the update also fixed a recolor I had been working on for months and that I couldn’t figure out how to fix, so yay, less work for me

Must contact me throught steam. I know exactly when them problems are sort of. >.>

edit: Whoops double post. Forgot I was on the same thread. <.<

Read full topic

Maybe there is way to auto convert all textures + adding effects
that way it could by all pink.
Personally I would like to see black/white hl2.
Like half life 2 becomes old school classic…

item.title: Pink HL2
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
ashton93:

Would you be angry, if anyone tried making Pink edition for HL1? Because I want to ^^
And I dont want to get into trouble.

Half-Life 1? No problem. Black Mesa? Yes, yes I will be angry. But you can do it if you want; I’m still going to do it myself once the mod is released

But if you mean HLS, then sure, go ahead!

item.title: Pink HL2
item.dc:creator: Hakkuze
item.description:
D-D-D-Double Post! Yes, it comes in Pink.

1024×576 76.8 KB

Made it the same day I made the new model but never got around to posting it. I think I should have made the grey hood parts black to better accent the pink, maybe I’ll redo it and post an update.

[Edit] Done.

1024×576 58.9 KB

This car’s title isn’t Pink, like the last one, it’s It Comes In Pink.
